verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, give ear <S%H238><s%> to my supplications <S%H8469><s%>: in your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H6666><s%>, and in your righteousness.
And enter <S%H935><s%> not into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with your servant <S%H5650><s%>: for in your sight <S%H6440><s%> shall no man living <S%H2416><s%> be justified <S%H6663><s%>.

For the enemy <S%H341><s%> has persecuted <S%H7291><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; he has struck <S%H1792><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> down <S%H1792><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>; he has made me to live <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H4285><s%>, as those that have been long <S%H5769><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%>.
Therefore is my spirit <S%H7307><s%> overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> inside me <S%H3820><s%>; my heart inside <S%H8432><s%> me is desolate <S%H8074><s%>.

I remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>; I meditate <S%H1897><s%> on all your works <S%H6467><s%>; I muse <S%H7878><s%> on the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%>.
I stretch forth <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> unto you <S%H5315><s%>: my soul thirsts after you <S%H5889><s%>, as a thirsty land <S%H776><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

Hear <S%H6030><s%> me speedily <S%H4118><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>: my spirit <S%H7307><s%> fails <S%H3615><s%>: hide <S%H5641><s%> not your face <S%H6440><s%> from me <S%H4911><s%>, lest I be like unto them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>.

Cause me to hear <S%H8085><s%> your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; for in you do I trust <S%H982><s%>: cause me to know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> where <S%H2098><s%> I should walk <S%H3212><s%>; for I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul unto you <S%H5315><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, from my enemies <S%H341><s%>: I flee unto you to hide me <S%H3680><s%>.

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> your will <S%H7522><s%>; for you are my God <S%H430><s%>: your spirit <S%H7307><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>; lead <S%H5148><s%> me into the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness <S%H4334><s%>.
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, for your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake <S%H6666><s%>: for your righteousness' sake bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of trouble <S%H6869><s%>.
And of your mercy <S%H2617><s%> cut off <S%H6789><s%> my enemies <S%H341><s%>, and destroy <S%H6><s%> all them that afflict <S%H6887><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>: for I am your servant <S%H5650><s%>.
